Name: Van Vlaanderen
Review Text: We really enjoyed our dinner here last night. The service was great and prices were very reasonable. The uni starter and 2 fish dishes were both highlights.

Name: Van Vlaanderen
Review Text:
Lovely place!
Good food! Good service! Nice quiet ambient!

Name: Van Vlaanderen
Review Text: Yesterday we had a dinner here to celebrate my boyfriend birthday. We ordered Bib Gourmand menu - 4 courses with cheese instead of the desert, with half a glass wine pairing for both, a glass of bubbly in the beginning and two extra glasses …

Name: Van Vlaanderen
Review Text: Fine dining restaurant nearby the city center. A great culinary experience accompanied with good, matching wines. The service was good as well, but I would have expected some more attention. Not cheap but worth the price.

Name: Van Vlaanderen
Review Text: Amazing service, amazing food, worth every penny!

Name: Van Vlaanderen
Review Text: Fantastic restaurant. Service was great, food was superb (we chose the option to be surprised by the chef), and ambiance is just right, with the right music and the right lighting tone. The only minus is that coffee comes together with unordered sweets, which they are added to the bill. This practice should be avoided.

Name: Van Vlaanderen

Name: Van Vlaanderen
Review Text: Excellent food and service! Nice atmosphere. Exciting menu and flavours.
